title: Anna Soubry – 2023 Comments After Commons Report Published that Boris Johnson Knowingly Lied to Parliament
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Anna Soubry, the Conservative MP for Broxtowe from 2010 to 2019, on Twitter on 15 June 2023.
content:
It’s official – [#BorisJohnson](https://twitter.com/hashtag/BorisJohnson?src=hashtag_click) is a liar. The man who led the campaign to take us out of the [#EU](https://twitter.com/hashtag/EU?src=hashtag_click) who was PM during [#Covid](https://twitter.com/hashtag/Covid?src=hashtag_click) is indeed the great charlatan many of us have been calling him for years. The worst PM ever must now be consigned to the rubbish bin of history.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
  *[R+D]: research and development
  *[GVA]: gross value added - the measure of the value of goods and services produced in a sector
  *[CEOs]: chief executive officers
  *[OECD]: Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development
  *[ESA]: Employment and Support Allowance
  *[
  ESA
 ]: Employment and Support Allowance
